channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk praises the ‘exponential improvement’ he’s seeing in Tesla’s full self-driving software
item.description: The Tesla CEO promises to launch a fully unsupervised version of his full self-driving software this year, but the technology is still far from mature...

item.title: Stocks forfeit gains as Wall Street’s attention turns to CPI — live coverage
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle call for Meta to reverse its decision on fact-checking, which they say was fueled by ‘ego or profit’
item.description: The royal couple has a history of being mistreated by misinformation in the media.

item.title: Amazon’s CEO Andy Jassy has a new advisor who will join him on every meeting he has
item.description: Meet the new shadow behind Amazon’s CEO: Alex Dunlap

item.title: Capital One cheated customers out of $2 billion: feds
Stock-market risk appetite is deteriorating in 2025: S&P Global
Crypto sector donates cash and digital currency for LA fire relief, Blockdaemon and Ripple help lead effort
item.description: Ripple will donate $100,000 of XRP to World Central Kitchen.

item.title: ‘DOGE’ fears shouldn’t hurt these defense contractors' stock
S&P 500 is sky-high. But there’s value to be had. Like these 13 dividend stocks.
Walgreens CEO says anti-shoplifting strategy backfired: ‘When you lock things up…you don’t sell as many of them’
item.description: Walgreens' CEO talked about the flip side of investing in increased security on a recent earnings call.
